New Records: Virat Kohli equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record for most ODI centuries (49)
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5-33 as South Africa subside to 83 all out in run-chase
Pre-Game Insights: India likely to top group following victory
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed that equaling Tendulkar's record was a huge honor
Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Eden Gardens became a sea of light as the crowd lit up their mobile phones in anticipation when Ravindra Jadeja nudged a single off Kagiso Rabada to bring Virat Kohli on strike on 99 in the 49th over
Others: South Africa's batting lineup struggled against India's bowling attack
